Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary


	We are looking for a talented Human Resources Officer to join our team.
	The ideal candidate will be responsible for promoting a positive and high performance work environment.
	This role requires a blend of administrative competence, interpersonal skills, and hands-on HR knowledge.

	Develop and implement HR strategies, policies, and procedures

	A minimum of Bachelor&#39;s Degree in Human Resources, Business Administration, Industrial Relations, or a related field. Relevant professional certifications such as CIPM will be an added advantage.


Experience:


	Must have 2 - 4 years of progressive HR experience, preferably within the hospitality industry.


Skills and Competencies:


	Strong understanding of HR principles and Nigerian labour laws.
	Ability to relate effectively with chefs and difficult personalities.
	Excellent organizational and multitasking abilities.
	Strong interpersonal and communication skills.
	High attention to detail and accuracy in record keeping.
	Proficient in Microsoft Office Suite (Word, Excel, PowerPoint).
	Professional, confidential, and solution-oriented approach.
	Ability to work independently and collaboratively with diverse people.
	Flexibility and adaptability in a fast-paced, service-driven environment.


Method of Application

Human Resources Officer Job at Rentachef NG




        
    

        
        Rentachef NG is a leading catering, hospitality consulting, and chef rental agency in Nigeria. Company provides private chef service to customers across Nigeria.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Human Resources Officer

Job Location: Lekki Phase 1, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary
     

            
    




	We are looking for a talented Human Resources Officer to join our team.
	The ideal candidate will be responsible for promoting a positive and high performance work environment.
	This role requires a blend of administrative competence, interpersonal skills, and hands-on HR knowledge.


Responsibilities


	Develop and implement HR strategies, policies, and procedures
	Maintain chef records and HR documentation of employees
	Coordinate training, team bonding and capacity development programs
	Ensure compliance with the labour laws and internal policies
	Conduct performance appraisals and support employee performance management systems
	Handle employee relations, conflict resolution, grievance procedures and support disciplinary processes.


Educational Qualification


	A minimum of Bachelor's Degree in Human Resources, Business Administration, Industrial Relations, or a related field. Relevant professional certifications such as CIPM will be an added advantage.


Experience:


	Must have 2 - 4 years of progressive HR experience, preferably within the hospitality industry.


Skills and Competencies:


	Strong understanding of HR principles and Nigerian labour laws.
	Ability to relate effectively with chefs and difficult personalities.
	Excellent organizational and multitasking abilities.
	Strong interpersonal and communication skills.
	High attention to detail and accuracy in record keeping.
	Proficient in Microsoft Office Suite (Word, Excel, PowerPoint).
	Professional, confidential, and solution-oriented approach.
	Ability to work independently and collaboratively with diverse people.
	Flexibility and adaptability in a fast-paced, service-driven environment.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV and Cover Letter to: rentachefrecruit@gmail.com using "Human Resource Officer" as the subject of the mail.

Wireline Engineer / Technician Job at Broadlog Support Services Limited




        
    

        
        Broadlog Support Services Limited - We are an oilfield services company providing high-quality electric line (E-line), wireline, and well intervention solutions to leading operators in Nigeria’s oil and gas industry. Our operations cover onshore, offshore, and base workshop support, with a strong commitment to safety, service excellence, and technical innovation.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Wireline Engineer / Technician

Job Location: Port Harcourt, Rivers

Job Summary
     

            
    




	Executes cased-hole and open-hole wireline services including logging, perforation, and well intervention.
	Ensures safe, efficient, and high-quality operations to meet client objectives.


Key Responsibilities


	Plan and execute wireline jobs including logging (CBL/VDL, PLT, gamma-ray, neutron, resistivity), perforation, and fishing operations.
	Assemble, test, and calibrate wireline tools, pressure control equipment, and surface systems before mobilization.
	Operate winch units, depth measurement systems, and acquisition software with precision.
	Maintain control of wireline under well pressure using lubricators, grease injection systems, and other pressure control devices.
	Supervise junior crew members and ensure adherence to HSE standards.
	Diagnose and rectify equipment malfunctions in the field to minimize downtime.


Requirements


	BSc or HND in Electrical/Electronic, Mechanical, or Petroleum Engineering.
	2–4 years of field experience in wireline logging and well intervention.
	Knowledge of pressure control equipment, downhole tools, and data acquisition systems.
	Valid BOSIET/HUET and H2S certification (for offshore roles).
	Ability to work in challenging environments and rotational schedules.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV and a brief cover letter to: careers@broadlog.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

Assistant Engineer Job at Dangote Group




        
    

        
        Dangote Group is one of Nigeria’s most diversified business conglomerates with a hard – earned reputation for excellent business practices and products’ quality with its operational headquarters in the bustling metropolis of Lagos, Nigeria in West Africa.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job PPosition: Assistant Engineer

Job Location: Ibese Plant, Ogun

Description
     

            
    




	We are looking for an electrical engineer who will help us advance our electrical products, systems, and applications.
	On a daily basis, you’ll carry out various engineering tasks, such as performing calculations to ensure our systems meet the global safety standards and collaborating with technicians and computer programmers to solve emerging issues.
	Ultimately, you will improve our company’s products and processes and contribute to its growth.
	Overseeing maintenance of Electrical equipment for optimum performance, raises indent for replacement of spare parts and provide maintenance support for shift operations.


Responsibilities


	Ensures/enforces maximum safety procedure in execution of all jobs.
	Supervises all planned and corrective maintenance jobs for effective/efficient plant operation.
	Participates in new equipment installations and commissioning.
	Organizes work schedules/manpower allocation of daily jobs in the plant.
	Perform power analysis on electricity consumptions.
	Modifies control for smooth process operations.
	Ensure compliance with ISO Standards


Requirements


	BSc / HND (Electrical/Electronic Engineering)
	Minimum of 5 years of post NYSC relevant experience
	Computer literate with proficiency in MS Word, Excel, Power Point.
	Should be able to work with less supervision.

title: Job Vacancies at Sambus Geospatial
content:
Sambus Geospatial is a Geographic Information System (GIS) and mapping company. We are the sole distributor of ESRI, ENVI, Trimble and WINGTRA Drones with exclusive representation in Ghana, Nigeria, Gambia, Gabon, Sierra Leone, Equatorial Guinea, and Liberia.

We are recruiting to fill the following positions below:

1.) GIS Training Officer

Job Location: Victoria Island, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Responsibilities
     

            
    




	Facilitate instructor-led training sessions, workshops, and webinars to impart GIS knowledge and skills to individuals and groups within the organization or client base.
	Design and develop comprehensive training curricula for GIS users, encompassing fundamental concepts, advanced techniques, and best practices in utilizing GIS software such as Esri ArcGIS, HERE, NV5's geospatial solutions, and Trimble technologies.
	Work with the Operations department to coordinate training schedules, venues, resources, and logistics to ensure smooth and efficient delivery of training programmes.
	Work closely with other departments to execute projects and software training for client organizations and end-users.
	Developing training schedules based and client requirements.
	Ensure training are delivered in the best possible ways.
	Ensure client satisfaction with training sessions,
	Ensure after-sales value additions to clients and resolve complaints within 48 hours
	Achieve positive customer support ratings.
	Recommend training module for client workflow.
	Ascertain the needs of customers, promote the relevant products, and demonstrate clearly how the products work.
	Update the training manual with the new technologies.
	Assist the sales to with modules, prices, and proposals when needed.
	Submit periodic reports on training delivered.
	Evaluate the effectiveness of training programs through participant feedback, post-training assessments, and performance metrics to measure learning outcomes and identify areas for improvement.
	Provide recommendations and improve system design, application technology, and operational performance for customers. Serve as a trusted advisor and advocate for customers on the Sambus solution capabilities.
	Collaborate with the sales/bd teams to support the Sambus business goals and business/technical goals of customers.
	Perform any other job-related roles assigned


Know How, Education & Experience


	A Bachelor’s Degree in Geography / Remote Sensing / GIS / Surveying or related discipline.
	A minimum of 3 years of training in Geospatial Domain.
	Technical knowledge and a comprehensive understanding of how the company products work.
	Be proficient in the use of Remote Sensing and GIS software, most especially Esri and NV5 Harris software.
	Extensive GIS systems training knowledge and experience.
	Committed to continuous education through workshops, seminars, and conferences.
	Strong analytical skills to assess training needs, diagnose learning gaps, customize training programs, and adapt instructional strategies to address challenges or barriers to learning effectively.
	Have at least one Esri technical certifications or other Similar certifications.
	Ability to work with people with different backgrounds.
	Strong interpersonal and communication skills.
	The ability to identify and follow up on leads.
	Exceptional skills in selling products and closing deals.
	Knowledge of sales promotion techniques.
	Excellent verbal and written communication skills to articulate complex GIS concepts clearly, explain technical procedures concisely, and engage participants effectively during training sessions, presentations, and demonstrations.
	Knowledge of Remote Sensing and GIS
	Analytical skill.


Salary
N250,000 - N300,000 / month.

Application Closing Date: 31st August, 2025.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: ymethana-bola@sambusgeospatial.com using "GIS Training Officer" as the subject of the mail.  

 

 

2.) Technical Support and Internal IT Officer

Job Location: Victoria Island, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Role Responsibilities
Support Duties:


	Day-to-day administration of servers, networks, systems, and internal infrastructure
	Troubleshooting and solving hardware and software problems based on staff issues
	Ensure that data security is adhered to in handling company data


Software Acquisition & Deployment:


	Design and monitor the implementation of end-to-end integrated systems
	Review new and existing system designs and make recommendations for improving or altering the internal I.T. systems


Infrastructure Management:


	Liaise with department heads and staff to maintain and update technical performance of internal I.T. infrastructure.
	Support the roll-out of new applications and set up new staff users' accounts andprofiles and deal with password issues
	Test and evaluate new technology
	Conduct electrical safety checks on computer equipment
	Install and configure computer hardware operating systems and applications
	Replace hardware parts as required.


Requirements


	Interested candidates should possess relevant qualifications and experience.


Application Closing Date: 31st August, 2025.

Method of Applictaion
Interested and qualified candidates should send their applications to: ymethana-bola@sambusgeospatial using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

 

 

3.) Technical Sales Officer

Job Location: Victoria Island, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Responsibilties


	Identify sales opportunities and follow the sequence of activities in the Sambus Sales Cycle to achieve annual sales targets.
	Networking and building connections as well as developing new accounts to build a potential sale pipeline.
	Developing a sales document, preparing quotes, and completing sales-related administration tasks.
	Providing outstanding after-sales services to clients and managing client relationships to ensure positive customer satisfaction reviews. Achieve minimum 4-star rating (i.e. 4 out 5) in the assigned vertical.
	Collaborating with the Finance & Operations Unit and the Tech team to ensure products are ordered and delivered within agreed timelines.
	This involves transferring orders to the Finance & Operations Unit for purchases to be made and ensuring that the Tech team delivers and trains clients on products purchased within the agreed timelines.
	Drive repeat sales by checking customer purchase history and cross-selling and/or upselling clients.
	Ensure customer loyalty by generating and suggesting added value services clients end-users withing client organizations can get from the products purchased.
	Keep the product knowledge and technical skills up to date by participating in ongoing training, workshop, and career development programmes.
	Accept ownership for generating, maintaining, and expanding sales and value-addition.
	services in the assigned vertical.


Operational reporting and feedback:


	To produce periodic operational reports to the line manager and provide feedback on market and customer developments that Sambus needs to respond to.
	Client and vertical research to stay up to date of industry developments and trends to build expertise and help serve clients/potential clients better.


Know How, Education & Experience


	A Bachelor’s Degree in GIS, Sales & Marketing, or a related field.
	A minimum of 4 years of sales or marketing experience.
	Technical knowledge and a comprehensive understanding of how the company products work.
	Strong interpersonal and communication skills.
	The ability to identify and follow up on leads.
	Exceptional skills in selling products and closing deals.
	Knowledge of sales promotion techniques.
	Excellent presentation skills and a professional appearance
	Knowledge of Remote Sensing and GIS.


Salary
N250,000 - N300,000 monthly.

Application Closing Date: 31st August, 2025.

Click here to apply online

 

 

4.) Marketer / CSR Officer

Job Location: Abuja (FCT)
Employment Type: Full-time

Role Summary


	 Responsible for creating compelling marketing campaigns that support the Company’s products and services.
	Develop marketing strategies that engage, attract, and increase sales to increase the Company’s market share.


Role Responsibilities


	Liaise with BD Lead to develop and implement marketing strategies based on the company’s annual strategic plans
	Monitor industry and competitive environment to proactively identify new opportunities, trends, emerging issues, or threats
	Recommend actions needed to maintain and improve our competitive product brand positioning and remain current with industry trends
	Apply strategic and analytical business-focused thinking to bring ideas to market
	Work with key stakeholders in Sales team and other client facing groups to create compelling, insight-driven campaigns and events to support our product brands and investment expertise on all the Company platforms.
	Ensure consistent use of positioning, brand, tone, and voice
	Promote the Company brand through direct marketing, advertisements, and brand awareness campaigns
	Manage the organization’s web platform and optimizing the search engine
	Develop promotional materials
	Develop publication materials (such as Newsletters and blogs)
	Plan and manage promotional events
	Developing and implement promotional budgets.


Qualifications 


	A Diploma or Degree in Business Administration / Marketing is required
	A minimum of 3 to 4 years of experience in a similar role is desirable.
	Computer literate
	Proficiency in social media is required
	A general knowledge of business administration is a must.


Salary
N200,000 monthly

Application Closing Date: 15th August, 2025.

Method of Applictaion
Interested and qualified candidates should send their applications to: kekesena@sambusgeospatial.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.
